local_intent: Detect red_plate, move above and align, lower until contact to confirm placement, open gripper to release white_plate, then retreat to safe height.
assumptions: white_plate is currently grasped and grasp is stable
red_plate is visible to the camera
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT transfer phase and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: positions over red_plate, aligns, lowers until contact, verifies contact, opens gripper to place the white plate, and retreats. Uses discretized bins for timing, force, and distances.
